doc.previous: Some composers have used fractional beats for example the time signature 2 4 appears in Carlos Ch vez s Piano Sonata No 3 1928 IV m 1
doc.after: Music educator Carl Orff proposed replacing the lower number of the time signature with an actual note image as shown at right This system eliminates the need for compound time signatures described above which are confusing to beginners While this notation has not been adopted by music publishers generally except in Orff s own compositions it is used extensively in music education textbooks Similarly American composers George Crumb and Joseph Schwantner among others have used this system in many of their works
